author: Marjory McGinn
title: The harsh realities of the Greek financial crisis
text: Expat Life The harsh realities of the Greek financial crisis One reader has seen first-hand the sadness and suffering of the locals and mass exodus of expats from Greece It's not only livelihoods that have changed under weight of austerity but the Greek character as well Photo: Matt Cardy/Getty By Marjory McGinn
